text: Ranan R. Lurie (; May 26, 1932 â€“ June 8, 2022) was an Egyptian-born Israeli- American political cartoonist and journalist. He was a senior associate at the CSIS (Center for Strategic and International Studies) from 1990 until his death.Ranan R. Lurie , CSIS He was a member of the United Nations Correspondents Association. He was founder and Editor-in-Chief of Cartoonews. Lurie was born in Cairo, Egypt but raised in Greenwich, Connecticut. Lurie died on June 8, 2022 in Las Vegas, Nevada at the age of 90.Ranan Lurie, Political Cartoonist With a Global Pen, Dies at 90 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Israeli journalists Category:American cartoonists Category:Journalists from Connecticut Category:People from Greenwich, Connecticut Category:Egyptian journalists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel
title: Ranan Lurie
